DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the possibility of shortening postoperative hospital stay after gastrectomy by early oral feeding as a component of an enhanced recovery protocol (ERAS).
DOC.brief_title: Early Oral Feeding After Total Gastrectomy for Cancer
DOC.criteria: Total gastrectomy for cancer Age 18 80 years Informed consent Numerous hepatic and peritoneal metastases Extended resections (pancreas, colon) Preoperative malnutrition requiring total parenteral nutrition Emergency surgery
